definition: The air taken into and sent out of the lungs while breathing. It's cold enough to see your breath today. A single act of taking in air and sending it out of the lungs: Take a deep breath. The ability to breathe easily and normally: I stopped tocatch my breath. A slight suggestion or hint: had never been touched by even a breath of scandal. A light current of air

things wanted or needed; the plural of desideratum : “Happily-ever-after” and “eternal love” appear to be the desiderata of the current generation; to whom “fat chance” say those of us who are older, wiser, and more curmudgeonly.

term: A man is known by the company he keeps
definition: Our character is reflected in our choice of friends
